message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.CV 

This paper is likely to belong to the arXiv CS sub-category of cs.CL (Computation and Language) as it deals with natural language processing and sentiment classification of long movie reviews. It could also belong to cs.LG (Machine Learning) as it proposes a modified architecture for Paragraph Vector to learn document embeddings. Additionally, it could be categorized under cs.IR (Information Retrieval) as sentiment classification is a common task in information retrieval. The paper also uses deep learning techniques, which could place it under cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Finally, the paper deals with movie reviews, which could involve image analysis, making cs.CV (Computer Vision) a possible sub-category as well.
